choose.when: insert into tbl_product(productname, description, brand, category, subcategory) values(#{productname}, #{description}, #{brand}, #{category}, #{subcategory} )
choose.otherwise: insert into tbl_product(productname, description, brand, category, subcategory, pictureurl) values(#{productname}, #{description}, #{brand}, #{category}, #{subcategory}, #{files})

mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product(productname, description, brand, category, subcategory) values(#{productname}, #{description}, #{brand}, #{category}, #{subcategory} )
